items.title: Trump threatens 25% import tax on Apple unless iPhones are made in the U.S.
items.description: President Trump on Friday threatened to put a 25% tariff on Apple products unless iPhones are manufactured in the United States.

items.title: Woman arrested, charged in spit incident on Trump's interim U.S. Attorney
items.description: The woman caught on camera spitting on the former U.S. Attorney for Washington was arrested Thursday.
